definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])

sentences.english: Hmm…Black pepper beef, fried shrimp and hot&sour soup.
sentences.chinese: 嗯黑胡椒牛柳，油煎大虾，再来个酸辣汤吧。

sentences.english: The nose shows black pepper and cloves aromas, with good spiciness.
sentences.chinese: 呈现良好的黑胡椒及丁香的气味。
黑胡椒是研磨的胡椒子。

sentences.english: Don't forget to add salt and pepper to taste.
sentences.chinese: 不要忘了要加入适量的盐和黑胡椒调味。

sentences.english: On the nose, the wine's aromas are of very ripe red fruits, anise and black pepper.
sentences.chinese: 带有各种成熟的红色浆果香，以及茴芹和黑胡椒香味。

sentences.english: Fruit paste aromas are complexed by ground black pepper, clove and cinnamon aromas.
sentences.chinese: 黑胡椒，丁香和桂皮芳香的完美结合。

sentences.english: Season the brisket with the salt and pepper.
sentences.chinese: 用盐和黑胡椒略腌牛肉。

sentences.english: Season with salt and black pepper.
Pepper crusted beef tenderloin, red wine jus, mushroom flan, and vegetable fries.
sentences.chinese: 黑胡椒牛柳，红酒沙司，蘑菇饼，和炸蔬菜条。

sentences.english: Now add bay leaf, black pepper and boil for 30 minutes more.
sentences.chinese: 现在加上月桂叶，黑胡椒再多煮30分钟。

sentences.english: Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper. Dust with flour.
sentences.chinese: 鸡腿去皮，用盐和黑胡椒腌制后扑上面粉。

sentences.english: Season the beef with a little salt and pepper; coat both sides with vegetable oil.
sentences.chinese: 牛排上洒少许盐和黑胡椒调味，淋上油，将两面涂匀。

sentences.english: Season salmon steaks with salt, pepper and Oliver oil, coat all over.
sentences.chinese: 洒盐和黑胡椒，橄榄油在鱼排的两面，并抹匀调味。

sentences.english: Ginger root, verbena, ginseng, black pepper.
sentences.chinese: 姜块，马鞭草，西洋参，黑胡椒。

sentences.english: Stir in the tomato, salt and pepper.
sentences.chinese: 加入小番茄，盐及黑胡椒炒匀。

sentences.english: Good sources include black pepper, yeast and wholemeal bread.
sentences.chinese: 良好的来源包括黑胡椒，酵母和全麦面包。
